title: for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media) (No. 2) Order 2024.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser (Minister 

for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media) (No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport media) (no 2) order 2024

title: for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media) (No. 2) Order 2024.
heading: John Doody, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. 

John Doody, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, 
is appointed as Special Adviser to the Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media with effect from 16 September 2024. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

10 September, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 20th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [469] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
